original_text: “I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of slavery.
korean_text: 나는 너를 애굽 땅, 종 되었던 집에서 인도하여 낸 네 하나님 여호와니라

sentences.original_text: I am the Lord your God
who brought you out of the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내신 분이며

sentences.original_text: out of the house of slavery
